headline: Omnissa Is Named a Leader for the Third Consecutive Year in the 2025 Gartner Magic Quadrant for Desktop as a Service
summary: MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif., September 02, 2025--Omnissa, a leading digital work platform company, today announced it has been named a Leader in the 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Desktop as a Service (DaaS) for the third consecutive year and ranked among the two highest scoring vendors across all Use Cases in the 2025 Gartner Critical Capabilities for DaaS report. Omnissa continues to set the standard for delivering secure, high-performance virtual desktops and applications with the Horizon Cloud

raw.headline: Omnissa Is Named a Leader for the Third Consecutive Year in the 2025 Gartner Magic Quadrant for Desktop as a Service

Omnissa continues to set the standard for delivering secure, high-performance virtual desktops and applications with the Horizon Cloud

headline: PolyAI Recognized in Multiple 2025 Gartner® Hype Cycle™ Reports for Customer Service, CRM, and Strategic Cost Optimization
summary: PolyAI, a leader in enterprise conversational AI, today announced it has been recognized in multiple 2025 Gartner reports, including the Hype Cycle for Customer Service and Support Technologies (July 2025), the Hype Cycle for CRM Technologies (July 2025), and the Hype Cycle for Strategic Cost Optimization (August 2025).

headline: These Were the S&P 500 Index's Worst Performing Stocks in August 2025
summary: A few tech stocks that had previously led the S&P 500 index higher were under pressure last month.

headline: Cerillion Recognised in the 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for AI in CSP Customer and Business Operations
summary: Cerillion (AIM: CER), a leading provider of composable BSS/OSS solutions to the telecoms industry, today announced that it has been named in Gartner's Magic Quadrant for AI in CSP Customer and Business Operations* and the Critical Capabilities for AI in CSP Customer and Business Operations**.
